summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the planning of a visit by the U.S. Attorney General to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) office. The primary agenda item for the visit is a briefing on the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

persons.name: Seth
persons.context: Addressee of an email from the USANYS office; appears to be coordinating the preparation of a trip book/binder for the Attorney General's visit.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Sender and primary point of contact for the SDNY visit agenda; proposes briefing the AG on the Epstein death investigation and schedules a meeting with the AG.

persons.name: Berman, Geoffrey
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Full name appears in the email signature; the sender of the initial agenda proposal on October 3, 2019.

connections.description: Geoff (Berman) is providing Seth with the agenda and briefing materials for the Attorney General's visit to the SDNY office.

events.title: Planned AG Visit to SDNY
events.description: A planned visit by the U.S. Attorney General to the Southern District of New York office, with a primary agenda item to discuss the Epstein death/MCC investigation.

events.title: Epstein Death at MCC
events.description: The death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, which is the subject of an ongoing investigation to be briefed to the Attorney General.

locations: Southern District of New York (SDNY) office
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney General was scheduled for a briefing on the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in October 2019.
The primary agenda item for the AG's visit to the SDNY was 'Epstein death/MCC investigation' from 9:00-10:00 am.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman (referred to as 'Geoff') was the SDNY point of contact coordinating the visit and briefing.
The email chain shows logistical planning for the visit, including the preparation of a trip book with head shots, summaries, and office statistics for the AG.
